name: @psenger/squirt-cli
description: yet another peer to peer encrypted file transfer utilizing native NodeJS Streams, Crypto, and HTTP for the most effective and stealth operation

scripts.clean: node -e "const {existsSync, readdirSync, lstatSync, unlinkSync, rmdirSync} = require('fs'); const {join} = require('path'); function rmDir(dirPath, subDir) { if (existsSync(dirPath)) { readdirSync(dirPath).forEach( (file) => { const filePath = join(dirPath, file); if (lstatSync(filePath).isDirectory()) {rmDir(filePath, true);} else unlinkSync(filePath) }); if (subDir) { rmdirSync(dirPath); } } }; rmDir(join(__dirname, 'dist'));"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:client-compressed && npm run build:server-compressed && npm run docs:readme
scripts.build:client-compressed: cross-env COMPRESS=true rollup -c rollup-client.config.js && chmod 766 dist/squirt-client-compressed.js
scripts.build:server-compressed: cross-env COMPRESS=true rollup -c rollup-server.config.js && chmod 766 dist/squirt-server-compressed.js

author: Philip A Senger <philip.a.senger@cngrgroup.com>
